mapper.update: UPDATE t_event SET C_IS_FULL = 0 SET C_IS_FULL = 1 WHERE C_ID = #{eventId};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_event_att WHERE C_EVENT_ID = #{eventId} AND C_ATTEND_USER_ID = #{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT C_NAME name, C_ID id FROM t_category;
SELECT C_ID id, C_CATEGORY_ID categoryId, C_NAME name, C_PICTURE_URL imageUrl FROM t_category_detail;
SELECT C_ID id, C_CATEGORY_ID categoryId, C_NAME name, C_PICTURE_URL imageUrl FROM t_category_detail WHERE C_CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId};

SELECT e.C_ID id, e.C_CONTENT content, e.C_PICTURE_URL pictureUrl, e.C_TITLE title, e.C_TYPE_ID typeId, e.C_EXPIRE_TIME expireTime, e.C_LIKE_COUNT likeCount, e.C_LOCATION location, e.C_COLLECT_COUNT collectCount, e.C_CREATE_TIME createTime, u.C_USERNAME publisherName, cd.C_NAME typeName FROM t_event e, t_user u, t_category_detail cd WHERE e.C_PUBLISHER_ID = u.C_ID AND e.C_TYPE_ID = cd.C_ID AND C_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%') AND e.C_status != 3 ORDER BY e.C_CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT e.C_ID id, e.C_CONTENT content, e.C_PICTURE_URL pictureUrl, e.C_TITLE title, e.C_TYPE_ID typeId, e.C_EXPIRE_TIME expireTime, e.C_LIKE_COUNT likeCount, e.C_COLLECT_COUNT collectCount, e.C_LOCATION location, e.C_CREATE_TIME createTime, u.C_USERNAME publisherName, cd.C_NAME typeName FROM t_event e, t_user u, t_category_detail cd WHERE e.C_PUBLISHER_ID = u.C_ID AND e.C_TYPE_ID = cd.C_ID AND e.C_TYPE_ID = #{typeId} AND e.C_status != 3 ORDER BY e.C_CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT e.*, cg.C_NAME categoryName, cd.C_NAME typeName, u1.C_USERNAME publisherName, c.C_CONTENT commentContent, c.C_PUBLISHER_ID commenterId, c.C_ID commentId, (SELECT u4.C_USERNAME FROM t_user u4 WHERE c.C_PUBLISHER_ID = u4.C_ID) commenterName, ea.C_CONTRACT_TYPE, ea.C_CONTRACT_NUM, ea.C_ID contractId, ea.C_ATTEND_USER_ID contracterId, ea.C_ATTEND_USERNAME attenderName FROM (t_event e, t_user u1, t_category_detail cd, t_category cg) LEFT JOIN t_event_att ea ON ea.C_EVENT_ID = e.C_ID LEFT JOIN t_comment c ON c.C_EVENT_ID = e.C_ID WHERE e.C_PUBLISHER_ID = u1.C_ID AND e.C_CATEGORY_ID = cg.C_ID AND e.C_TYPE_ID = cd.C_ID AND e.C_ID = #{eventId} AND e.C_status != 3 ORDER BY e.C_CREATE_TIME DESC
SELECT C_LIMIT_NUMBER limitNumber, C_ATTENDED_COUNT attendNumber FROM t_event WHERE C_ID = #{eventId};

SELECT e.C_ID id, e.C_CONTENT content, e.C_PICTURE_URL pictureUrl, e.C_TITLE title, e.C_TYPE_ID typeId, e.C_EXPIRE_TIME expireTime, e.C_LIKE_COUNT likeCount, e.C_COLLECT_COUNT collectCount, e.C_LOCATION location, e.C_CREATE_TIME createTime, u.C_USERNAME publisherName, cd.C_NAME typeName FROM t_event e, t_user u, t_category_detail cd WHERE e.C_PUBLISHER_ID = u.C_ID AND e.C_TYPE_ID = cd.C_ID AND e.C_status != 3 AND C_LATITUDE > #{minLat} AND C_LATITUDE < #{maxLat} AND C_LONGITUDE > #{minLng} AND C_LONGITUDE < #{maxLng} ORDER BY ACOS(SIN((#{latitude} * 3.1415) / 180) * SIN((C_LATITUDE * 3.1415) / 180) + COS((#{latitude} * 3.1415) / 180) * COS((C_LATITUDE * 3.1415) / 180) * COS((#{longitude} * 3.1415) / 180 - (C_LONGITUDE * 3.1415) / 180)) * 6380 ASC

SELECT e.C_ID id, e.C_CONTENT content, e.C_PICTURE_URL pictureUrl, e.C_TITLE title, e.C_TYPE_ID typeId, e.C_EXPIRE_TIME expireTime, e.C_LIKE_COUNT likeCount, e.C_COLLECT_COUNT collectCount, e.C_LOCATION location, e.C_CREATE_TIME createTime, u.C_USERNAME publisherName, cd.C_NAME typeName FROM t_event e, t_user u, t_category_detail cd WHERE e.C_PUBLISHER_ID = u.C_ID AND e.C_TYPE_ID = cd.C_ID AND e.C_status != 3 ORDER BY e.C_CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT 3;
